name: Attack Heroes
description: Attack Heroes is a funny-hot blood indie game which requires your abilities to finish all the challenging stages.We mixed the Japanese 'Moe' style battle scenes and original vocaloid BGMs,for showing the core of acting animes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: I'm a fan of RTK (Romance of Three Kingdoms), so this totally appeals to me. Furthermore it comes with very nice artwork, funny dialogues, and awesome music (definitely some parody here).  Gameplay is easy to learn, and I had lots of fun trying out different combos on my first try. In short you bring a max of 4 characters with you from stage to stage like an arcade game, and earn 'coins' along that way, which can be used to upgrade your characters to unlock additional skills to be used for combos.  I'm definitely sold here. Great game for a great price. 8/10  FYI, I'm playing it using chinese traditional, and via a controller.
